IdentityStore - Interface in javax.security.identitystore
IdentityStore is a mechanism for validating a Caller's credentials and accessing a Caller's identity attributes, and would be used by an authentication mechanism, such as JASPIC.

Validator - Annotation Type in javax.security.identitystore.annotation
Validator is a CDI Qualifier, which registers CredentialValidator implementations for use by IdentityStore, to validate a Credential implementation against an IdentityStore implementation.
